hanzi-su-wiki:
映

Значения

Отражаться, падать (о тени); выходить (о снимке); быть фотогеничным; отражать, бросать (тень); фотографировать, снимать копию; блестеть, сверкать; копия

Мнемоника

  • Время нахождения солнца 日 по центру 央 небосвода, полдень, когда тень — минимальна.

  • Центральная 央 фигура кино бросает тень на экран.

Варианты

暎
purpleculture_pinyin:
yìng
to reflect (light); to shine; to project (an image onto a screen etc)
отражать (светить); сиять; проецировать (изображение на экран и т. д.)

purpleculture_info: Pictophonetic: 央 indicates the sound; 日 (sun) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
反映 [ fǎn yìng ]: to mirror; to reflect; mirror image; reflection; (fig.) to report; to make known; to render
放映 [ fàng yìng ]: to show (a movie); to screen
掩映 [ yǎn yìng ]: hidden from view; alternately hidden and visible; setting off each other
映照 [ yìng zhào ]: to shine upon; to reflect
映衬 [ yìng chèn ]: to set off by contrast; antithesis; analogy parallelism (linguistics)
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿰ Left to right
    • 日 [ rì ] sun; day; daytime
    • 央 [ yāng ] central; to beg; to run out
heisig_chinese_memo: In the solar system, the Sun is the central source of all light, everything else just reflects it.
heisig_constituent: reflect, sun, day, centre, center, large, St. Bernard
koohiiStory1: In the solar system, the Sun is the central source of all light, everything else just reflects it.
koohiiStory2: A solar power plant consists of thousands of mirrors reflecting the sun´s rays, concentrating the energy on a focal point at the centre. See here: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Solar_Two.
kunYomi: うつ.る、うつ.す、は.える、-ば.え
jp_example_words:
映写(えいしゃ): projection
映像(えいぞう): reflection, image
映える(はえる): to shine, to look attractive, to look pretty
映す(うつす): project, reflect, cast (shadow)
映る(うつる): be reflected, harmonize with
反映(はんえい): reflection, influence
映画(えいが): movie, film
映画館(えいがかん): movie theatre (theater), cinema
jp_readingExamples: 映す (うつ.す), 映る (うつ.る), 映える (は.える)
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: The sun in the center of the sky gives off its light, which reflects off of everything around it.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Look around you, everything you see is reflecting the light of the sun. Unless it's night time, then the tiny sun in the center of your lightbulb is creating the light that reflects there.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: This reflected light is important for acorns (えい), in particular. Without light reflecting off everything, the sun's light would never make it down to the ground where they've fallen. They would never grow into trees. And we'd all suffocate.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Picture the light of the sun reflecting off a single acorn on the forest floor. So much symbolism!
Ru_trainchinese: yìng: (глаг) отражать; светиться; показывать фильм
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the centre (央) of the sun (日) shines
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: In the solar system, the Sun is the central source of all light, everything else just reflects it.
humanum_full_description_en:
From " day " to " center " sound, the original meaning is shining. "Shuowen Xinfu": "Ming Ye. Hidden also. From the day, Yang Sheng." "Wen Xuan-Guo Pu "Jiang Fu"": "Qing Lun competes for correction, the tape group competes for projection." Liu Liang's Note: "Correct , Chaos; strife, friendship. Talking too much and chaos is shining." " Ying " can mean sunshine. Han Wang Can "Seven Ai": "The hills have more reflections, and Yan'a gains weight."

" Ying " also means concealing and hiding. "Selected Works-Yan Yanzhi "Yingzhao Guan Beihu Tianshou": "Lou Guan overlooks Fengying, Jin Jia reflects Songshan." Li Shan's note: "Ying is still hidden."

" Ying " also refers to no time, one to three in the afternoon. Ming Yang Shen's "Sequence of Danqian-Richang Yueying": "Emperor Liang Yuan's "Compilation Yao" says: "The day is at noon and the pavilion is said to be reflected."

" Ying " also means responding and responding. "Cold Eye View" Chapter 4: "But seeing Yuyu Lianyun, Qionglou recently, there are bells and drums from far away, reflecting the Qiaolou, the sound of intermittent harmony."
humanum_short_description_en: From the sound of " day " and " center ", the original meaning is shining.
humanum_full_description:
從「日」，「央」聲，本義為照耀。《說文新附》：「明也。隱也。从日，央聲。」 《文選‧郭璞〈江賦〉》：「青綸競糾，縟組爭映。」劉良注：「糾，亂；爭，交也。言多而交亂為暉映也。」「映」可表示陽光。漢王粲〈七哀〉：「山崗有餘映，巖阿增重陰。」

　　「映」也表示遮蔽、隱藏。《文選‧顏延之〈應詔觀北湖田收〉》：「樓觀眺豐穎，金駕映松山。」李善注：「映，猶蔽也。」

　　「映」亦指未時，午後一時至三時。明楊慎《丹鉛續錄‧日昃曰映》：「梁元帝《纂要》云：『日在午曰亭，在未曰映。』」

　　「映」還表示應和、照應。《冷眼觀》第4回：「但見玉宇連雲，瓊樓近日，遠遠有鐘鼓之音，映着譙樓更柝，斷續鳴和。」

Pinyin: yìng
English Definition: to reflect (light); to shine; to project (an image onto a screen etc)
Total strokes: 9; Radical: 日
Pictophonetic: 央 indicates the sound; 日 (sun) conveys the meaning.
Character Formation:

    • 日 [ rì ] sun; day; daytime
    • 央 [ yāng ] central; to beg; to run out

從「 日 」，「 央 」聲，本義為照耀。《說文新附》：「明也。隱也。从日，央聲。」 《文選‧郭璞〈江賦〉》：「青綸競糾，縟組爭映。」劉良注：「糾，亂；爭，交也。言多而交亂為暉映也。」「 映 」可表示陽光。漢王粲〈七哀〉：「山崗有餘映，巖阿增重陰。」 「 映 」也表示遮蔽、隱藏。《文選‧顏延之〈應詔觀北湖田收〉》：「樓觀眺豐穎，金駕映松山。」李善注：「映，猶蔽也。」 「 映 」亦指未時，午後一時至三時。明楊慎《丹鉛續錄‧日昃曰映》：「梁元帝《纂要》云：『日在午曰亭，在未曰映。』」 「 映 」還表示應和、照應。《冷眼觀》第4回：「但見玉宇連雲，瓊樓近日，遠遠有鐘鼓之音，映着譙樓更柝，斷續鳴和。」
From " day" to " center" sound, the original meaning is shining. "Shuowen Xinfu": "Ming Ye. Hidden also. From the day, Yang Sheng." "Wen Xuan-Guo Pu "Jiang Fu"": "Qing Lun competes for correction, the tape group competes for projection." Liu Liang's Note: "Correct , Chaos; strife, friendship. Talking too much and chaos is shining." " Ying" can mean sunshine. Han Wang Can "Seven Ai": "The hills have more reflections, and Yan'a gains weight." " Ying" also means concealing and hiding. "Selected Works-Yan Yanzhi "Yingzhao Guan Beihu Tianshou": "Lou Guan overlooks Fengying, Jin Jia reflects Songshan." Li Shan's note: "Ying is still hidden." " Ying" also refers to no time, one to three in the afternoon. Ming Yang Shen's "Sequence of Danqian-Richang Yueying": "Emperor Liang Yuan's "Compilation Yao" says: "The day is at noon and the pavilion is said to be reflected." " Ying" also means responding and responding. "Cold Eye View" Chapter 4: "But seeing Yuyu Lianyun, Qionglou recently, there are bells and drums from far away, reflecting the Qiaolou, the sound of intermittent harmony."

映字的基本解释

映
yìng
照射：映射。映照。
反照，照射而显示：反映（ａ．反照，反射；ｂ．把容观事物表现出来；ｃ．向上级转达，如“映映群众意见”）。映衬（映托使显现）。映雪读书（形容家贫而苦读）。

映字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yìng］
［《廣韻》於敬切，去映，影。］
亦作“暎1”。
(1)照；照耀。
(2)因光线照射而显出；反映。
(3)日光；阳光。
(4)遮；隐藏。
(5)未时。午后一时至三时。
(6)应和；照应。

映字的英文翻译

◎ 映
mirror, reflect, shine

映字的康熙字典解释

【辰集上】【日字部】　映； 康熙笔画：9； 页码：页493第01
【廣韻】於敬切【集韻】【韻會】於慶切【正韻】於命切，?英去聲。【說文】明也，隱也。【梁元帝·纂要】日在午曰亭，在未曰映。【潘岳·射雉賦】畏映日之儻朗。　又【王羲之·蘭亭詩序】映帶左右。　又【廣韻】烏朗切【集韻】倚朗切，?音坱。【玉篇】映㬒，不明也。

映字的源字形

映字的起名意思

：指照射；反照，照射而显示。

reflect
Basic explanation of words
reflect
yìng
Irradiation: mapping. Mirrored.
Reflect, illuminate and show: Reflect (a. Reflect, reflect; b. Show the apparent things; c. convey to the higher level, such as "reflecting the opinions of the masses"). Reflecting (Yingtuo makes manifestation). Yingxue reads (describes a poor family and studies hard).
reflect
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yìng］
["Guangyun" Yu Jingqie, go to film, film. ]
Also known as "Ying 1".
(1) Shine; shine.
(2) Appeared due to light exposure; reflected.
(3) Sunlight; Sunlight.
(4) Cover; hide.
(5) Untimely. One to three in the afternoon.
(6) Correspondence; responsiveness.

Улица А я
yìng
I гл.
1) сиять (отражённым светом), отсвечивать; блистать, искриться, играть (напр. красками)
窗户映着灯光 окна отражают свет лампы (отсвечивают)
车服晖映 колесницы и одежды переливались гаммой цветов
2) отражаться
水天相映 воды и небеса отражаются друг в друге
映水 отражаться в воде
3) показывать (фильм)
开映时不得入场 во время демонстрации фильма вход в зал воспрещён
II сущ.
1) игра света и теней, блики
山冈有余映 на холмах видны блики солнечного света
2) * послеполуденное время, часы 未

映

Значения

Отражаться, падать (о тени); выходить (о снимке); быть фотогеничным; отражать, бросать (тень); фотографировать, снимать копию; блестеть, сверкать; копия

Мнемоника

  • Время нахождения солнца 日 по центру 央 небосвода, полдень, когда тень — минимальна.

  • Центральная 央 фигура кино бросает тень на экран.

Варианты

暎

Radicals: 日, 央  (sun, center)
Meaning Mnemonic
The sun in the center of the sky gives off its light, which reflects off of everything around it.
Look around you, everything you see is reflecting the light of the sun. Unless it's night time, then the tiny sun in the center of your lightbulb is creating the light that reflects there.
Reading Mnemonic
This reflected light is important for acorns (えい), in particular. Without light reflecting off everything, the sun's light would never make it down to the ground where they've fallen. They would never grow into trees. And we'd all suffocate.
Picture the light of the sun reflecting off a single acorn on the forest floor. So much symbolism!

Examples: 映す (うつ.す), 映る (うつ.る), 映える (は.える)
ノ, 大 (большой), 日 (день)
